column14: PLUG FYI A new AAA study found that when the temp dropped to 20 degrees F EV range fell by an average of 41 percent on 5 models it tested
PLUG Has anyone heard news about hybrid electric vehicles with plug in electric batteries fuel cells for backup and extended mileage
PLUG There is about 34 million shares shorted That is the reason the stock price is still down
PLUG If PLUG price just gets back to where it was much of last year investors will get 50 return or more I will be OK with 30 to start
PLUG Shorts have worked hard to keep stock price down Once PLUG is profitable they will go to other companies where they can make money
PLUG Great time to buy PLUG Stock It will be up at least 30 next year and probably much higher Continued high growth and lower costs
PLUG Expected increase in revenue for 2019 close to 40 with 70 already committed Also break even for 2019 What more do you want
PLUG Shorts know this is a good time to push the price down Many large investors are on the sidelines waiting for good news Buy now
PLUG what an opportunity Shorts pushing PLUG down At this price point it could double by next earnings if earnings break even or better
